item.title: Let's create a Coverage Analyzer, Part 2
item.description: This is part two of my journey creating a Java (Line) Coverage Analyzer. Here we’ll actually implement the Byte Code Instrumentation, as pointed out in the first part. Since processing the Byte Code itself, i.e. reading the classes, finding the methods, processing line number information, is in itself a huge task, let’s rely on the ASM library for that.
